item.title: Motivations
item.description: ISA v5, p14: Ubiquitous computing changes threat models Dramatic changes in threat models, resulting from ubiquitous connectivity and pervasive uses of computer technology in many diverse and widely used applications such as wireless mobile devices, automobiles, and critical infrastructure. Endless “patch and pray” calls for architectural ‘immunity’ An extended “arm race” of inevitable vulnerabilities and novel new attack mechanisms has led to a cycle of “patch and pray”.
